message.title: Message
message.description: User input message for the agent.

conversation_id.title: Conversation Id
conversation_id.description: Existing conversation identifier to maintain context.

agent_type.title: Agent Type
agent_type.description: Optional explicit agent to handle the message.

context.title: Context
context.description: Optional, structured context to pass through.

share_location.title: Share Location
share_location.description: When true, allows the assistant to use provided coarse location for web search.

location.description: Optional coarse location (city/region/country/timezone) for location-biased search.

AgentChatRequest.title: AgentChatRequest
AgentChatRequest.description: Request body for initiating or continuing a chat session.

response.title: Response
response.description: Natural language reply from the agent.

structured_output.title: Structured Output
structured_output.description: If the agent used structured outputs, this carries the parsed object.

agent_used.title: Agent Used

handoff_occurred.title: Handoff Occurred
handoff_occurred.description: Indicates whether a handoff happened mid-conversation.

attachments.title: Attachments
attachments.description: Attachments created during the response (e.g., generated images).

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata returned by the agent pipeline.

AgentChatResponse.description: Response body returned after the agent processes a message.

last_used.title: Last Used

next_cursor.description: Opaque cursor for the next page. Null when no additional events exist.

honeypot.description: Spam trap field; should remain empty.
